file_content.text: Your mother said you could be saved. Prove her right. Join me, and we can stop Vaylin together.
Join me.
Senya's dead. I killed her.
I killed your mother.
Koth! Arcann's escaping!
Now would be a good time to put aside our differences and stop him.
Stop him.
No can do.
Got my own fires to put out.
Fight your own battles.
Vaylin's going to disintegrate her family--along with half of Voss.
Kill them all.
Those ships belong to the Sith Empire.
Maybe they want to join the fight.
They could be useful.
Arcann will return.
To help me overthrow Vaylin? Or break my neck?
Arcann escaped. That's all that matters.
I only care about Arcann.
To destroy your Alliance. You think you are unassailable, but consider the cost of your victory....
And I'll crush him the second he shows his metal-capped face.
You have not earned such confidence. Consider the cost of your hard-won victory....
Thousands killed.
A planet devastated.
A mother's sacrifice.
There is only one way to end this chaos and bring order to the galaxy. You must seize the Eternal Throne.
I don't want the throne.
You are no ordinary leader.
As the supreme leader of Zakuul, no one could challenge me.
You dared the Long Shadow, gazed into the void--and somehow emerged triumphant.
You fell before my influence, but it couldn't contain you. You hunted me countless times--and always you survived.
You rooted out the seeds I sowed in your ranks, defeating even one of your own.
You became one with Havoc, fought your enemy's greatest warrior--and seized victory.
You were wrath made flesh. You destroyed my enemies and made the dark lords tremble.
You consumed death itself, used its power to reach new and extraordinary heights.
By your hand, the lowest criminals and most powerful leaders are made equal. You are the ultimate predator.
Conspirators mastered your mind and sought to destroy your body, but you outwitted them--and transcended.
You are the Alliance Commander, champion of fear and conqueror of my every challenge.
Do you count yourself among that number?
Not even you?
My time has passed. Only you can take the Eternal Throne.
Keep the compliments coming.
But first, you will strike down Vaylin and claim the Eternal Throne.
It is your destiny.
It's over, Arcann. Give yourself up, or I will personally hunt you to the ends of the galaxy.
Surrender or else.
Impressive display back there. You even managed to kill Senya.
[Lie] You killed your mother.
No.
A few seconds earlier, and they could've stopped Arcann.
If only they'd arrived sooner.
The Sith Empire once wanted me dead. But if they're looking for peace, we may need new allies in the hunt for Arcann.
I knew the Sith Empire would seek me out sooner or later. Their help won't come cheap, but we may need new allies in the hunt for Arcann.
No one is more worthy of taking the throne, not even my children.
Claiming the throne is no simple task.
Easier said than done.
You are up to the challenge.
I alone deserve the greatest power in the galaxy.
I was made for the throne.
Then you must seize it. The Eternal Throne is yours for the taking.
Even the most noble leader risks corruption on the seat of your twisted throne.
Even the best leader isn't immune to your throne's corruption.
Don't stop there. Keep telling me how great I am.
By all means, continue stroking my ego.
Arcann!
Your mother survived the ritual. She needs your help.
Senya is alive.
No. You are not alone.
No. She wouldn't fall to you.
In her final moments, she begged for Valkorion's embrace and wept for the children who failed her.
You're becoming quite the family-killer. First your brother, now your mother--butchered by the son she fought to save.
Raargh!
[Attack Arcann]
She had a nice little reunion with Valkorion. They reminisced about what a failure you are.
I was born to be Empress.
I was born to be Emperor.
You are powerful, shrewd, and peerless. An Empress in the making.
You are powerful, shrewd, and peerless. An Emperor in the making.
Those ships belong to the Sith Empire. Maybe they want to join our Alliance.
Vaylin's going to disintegrate her family--along with half of Voss!
Arcann's gone...
And Vaylin's warships retreated, thanks to the Imperial Fleet. Perhaps the Sith Empire wants to join our Alliance.
All forward batteries--fire on the Eternal Fleet!
